net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm

Class ClassicalALAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm.AbstractALAlgorithm
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm.ClassicalALAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IAlgorithm, IConfigure, ITool, JCLAL

    public class ClassicalALAlgorithm
extends AbstractALAlgorithm
implements ITool
    Class that represents a Classical Active Learning Algorithm.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • doIterate

        protected void doIterate()
        Establishes the different elements contained in an iteration in the ambience of active learning. In case of the classic algorithm of active learning it includes the training of the model, his evaluation, the selection of instances, the labeling of the same ones and the update of the dataset
        Specified by:
        doIterate in class AbstractALAlgorithm

        Executes the training phase. Train the base classifier

      • doControl

        protected void doControl()
        Check if algorithm is finished By default the implementation of this method performs the following operations:
        • If number of iterations exceeds the maximum allowed, then the algorithm is stopped
        • If unlabeled set is empty, then the algorithm is stopped

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Overrides:
        configure in class AbstractALAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration object for the classic algorithm The XML labels supported are:

        • max-iteration= int

        • scenario type= class.

          Package: net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario

          Class: All

        • stop-criterio type= class.

          Package: net.sf.jclal.activelearning.stopcriterion

          Class: All
